description: Enterprise techniques used by Agent Tesla, ATT&CK software S0331 v1.0
name: Agent Tesla (S0331)

techniques.comment: Agent Tesla collects account information from the victim’s machine.
Agent Tesla can steal data from the victim’s clipboard.
Agent Tesla encrypts the data with 3DES before sending it over the C2 server.
Agent Tesla has the capability to kill any running analysis processes and AV software.
Agent Tesla has routines for exfiltration over SMTP, FTP, and HTTP.
Agent Tesla exploits CVE-2017-11882 in Microsoft’s Equation Editor to execute a process.
Agent Tesla can log keystrokes on the victim’s machine.
Agent Tesla obfuscates its code in an apparent attempt to make analysis difficult.
Agent Tesla lists the current running processes on the system.
Agent Tesla adds itself to the Registry as a startup program to establish persistence.
Agent Tesla can download additional files for execution on the victim’s machine.
Agent Tesla can capture screenshots of the victim’s desktop.
Agent Tesla has used HTTP and SMTP for C2 communications.
Agent Tesla collects the system's computer name and also has the capability to collect information on the processor, memory, and video card from the system.
Agent Tesla can collect the IP address of the victim machine.
Agent Tesla collects the username from the victim’s machine.
Agent Tesla can collect the timestamp from the victim’s machine.
Agent Tesla has enabled TCP on port 587 for C2 communications.
Agent Tesla can access the victim’s webcam and record video.
